text: The Tabernacle was a tent used in the Book of Exodus as a temple or dwelling place of God. The word is still used in Catholicism for the box in which the Host or Eucharistic bread is kept, and for Non-conformist and Mormon churches. ==Related pages== *Leviticus *Metropolitan Tabernacle *Salt Lake Tabernacle ==Other websites== *Tabernacle model Category:Old Testament
title: Tabernacle
